newsitem.title: USA: Yields fall on Bond Buyer's weekly indices.
newsitem.headline: Yields fall on Bond Buyer's weekly indices.

text.p: Yields on all three of the Bond Buyer municipal bond indices fell this week.
The yield on the 20-bond index of general obligation bonds calculated Thursday was 5.67 percent, down four basis points from last week.
The yield on the 11-bond index of GO bonds was 5.58 percent, down three basis points.
The yield on the 30-year revenue bond index was 5.91 percent, down seven.
